questions.question: What is the primary function of the depicted item, based solely on its visual appearance?
Considering its visual properties, what is the apparent material composition of the product shown?
Judging from the image, what is the dominant geometric shape of the presented product?
Based on visual inspection, what descriptive adjective best captures the product's surface quality?
From a visual standpoint, what is the overall transparency level of the showcased item?
What color best represents the edges and border of the displayed product, as it is visually apparent?
If we were to describe its texture in one word, based only on visual cues, what would it be?
What is the most prominent visual characteristic illustrating the product's intended application?
Does the displayed product appear to have any visible markings, labels, or design elements visible in the provided image?
Visually, how many distinct pieces constitute the pictured product?
Considering the visible image, what is the apparent thickness of the item?
Based solely on visual observation, describe the overall aesthetic presentation of the product shown.
What is the apparent level of reflectivity of the product, judged by its visual presentation?
From the image, what is the visual relationship between the two pieces of this product?
Considering the image, how would you describe the product's apparent rigidity?
